<L>6587<pc>449-1<k1>माधव<k2>माधव<h>2
{@Mādhava@}<sup>2</sup>¦ (do.) = Kṛṣṇa Vāsudeva: I, †171, †197, 546,
7360, 7888, 7984 ({%svasāraṃ M°sya%}, i.e. Subhadrā), 7994,
8078 ({%Pārtha-M°au%}), 8171, 8199, 8275; II, 643, 1216,
1223, 1362, 1431, 1559; III, 733, 13006; IV, 1434 ({%K°%});
V, †9, 133, 141, 2526, 2539 ({%sarvalokamaheśvaraṃ%}), 2563,
2583, 2622, 2655, 2657, 2665, 2766, 2820, 2844, 2845, 2856,
2959, 2988, 2990, 3027, 3042 ({%Vṛṣṇirāṣṭrasya bhartā goptā%}
{%ca%}), 3116, 3122, 3187, 3198, 3202, 3250, 3291, 3296, 3306,
3335, 3368, 3385, 4197, 4247, 4249, 4255, 4406, 4433, 4452,
4655, 4760, 4763, 4778, 4786, 4804, 4844, 4854, 4861, 4874,
4882, 5382(?); VI, 772, 843, 868, 2048, 2172, 2556, 3566,
3741, 4334, 4841, 4855, 4859, 4872, 4875, 4926, 4929, 4931,
4936, 4977, 4993 ({%? saha-M°āḥ%}), 5755; VII, 112, 395, 1222,
2490, 2527 ({%svasrīyo M°sya%}, i.e. Abhimanyu), 2715, 2778,
2832, 2943, 2959, 2964, 3280 ({%Vāsudevaṃ%}), 3703, 3825,
3859, 5249, 5873, 5948, 6342, 6472, 7765 ({%Pāṇḍava-M°au%},
i.e. Arjuna and Kṛṣṇa), 8330, 8462, 8463; VIII, 634, 645
[Page449-b+ 63]
({%°-Pāṇḍavau%}), 1091, 1092, 2816 ({%°-Pāṇḍavau%}), 2899, 2955,
3549 ({%Govinda%}), 3574, 3578, 3794, 3796, 4475 ({%°-Pāṇḍavau%}),
4483, 4489, †4652, 4654, 4956, 5017 ({%°-Phālgunau%}), 5021
({%°-Pāṇḍavau%}); IX, 345, 346, 693 ({%°vacaḥ%}), 811 ({%K°%}), 1290,
1291, 1292, 1312, 1317, 1318, 1321, 1455, 1460, 1747, 1907,
1953, 3458, 3525, 3528, 3535, 3572; XI, 355, 444, 496,
509, 516, 519, 532, 538, 547, 550, 560, 602, 611, 654, 659,
661, 665, 673, 677, 691, 717, 722, 738; XII, 10, 894, 1557,
1577, 1580, 1690, 1897, 1903, 1948, 3053, 13359 ({%devaḥ%}),
13709; XIII, 599, 698, 702, 706, 711, 968, 1122, 1290,
2030, 2138, †3459, 4655, 4662, 5374, 6349, 6895, 6911,
6957 (= Viṣṇu, 1000 names), 6967 (do.), 7027 (do.);
XIV, 413, 424, 576, †1533, 1544, 1558, 1953, 1974, 2563;
XVI, 100, 101.
<LEND>
